languages.text: "Я..." {n}Кассия замирает в неуверенности, но через секунду ее испуганный взгляд черствеет.{/n} "Я не намерена оправдываться перед ксеносом. Желаете знать мое мнение? Атлас необходимо спасти и продолжить использовать на благо Человечества, а не этих премерзких тварей. Так на чьей вы стороне, Вольный Торговец?"

traits.locale_text: "Я..." {n}Кассия замирает в неуверенности, но через секунду ее испуганный взгляд черствеет.{/n} "Я не намерена оправдываться перед ксеносом. Желаете знать мое мнение? Атлас необходимо спасти и продолжить использовать на благо Человечества, а не этих премерзких тварей. Так на чьей вы стороне, Вольный Торговец?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "I shan't explain myself to a xenos. Do you wish to know what I think? The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity, and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, whose side are you on, Rogue Trader?"
languages.original_text: "Я..." {n}Кассия замирает в неуверенности, но через секунду ее испуганный взгляд черствеет.{/n} "Я не намерена оправдываться перед ксеносом. Желаете знать мое мнение? Атлас необходимо спасти и продолжить использовать на благо Человечества, а не этих премерзких тварей. Так на чьей вы стороне, Вольный Торговец?"

traits.locale_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, but then her frightened gaze quickly hardens.{/n} "I shall not explain myself to a xenos. You wish to know my opinion? The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, whose side are you on, Rogue Trader?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, whose side are you on, Rogue Trader?"

The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity, and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, who are you siding with, Rogue Trader?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity, and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, who are you siding with, Rogue Trader?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "I shan't explain myself to a xenos. Do you wish to know what I think? The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity, and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, whose side are you on, Rogue Trader?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "I shan't explain myself to a xenos. Do you wish to know what I think? The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity, and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, whose side are you on, Rogue Trader?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「あたくしは…」{n}カシアは口ごもって身じろぎもせず、怯えた目で一点を見つめている。{/n}「あたくしの立場を異種族に説明するつもりはありません。あたくしの考えを知りたいと？我々はアトラスを守り、人類の利益のために使い続けなくてはなりません。こうした恐ろしい怪物ではなく、人類のために。さて、自由開拓者様、あなたはどちらにつくのですか？」
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "I shan't explain myself to a xenos. Do you wish to know what I think? The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity, and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, whose side are you on, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: 「あたくしは…」{n}カシアは口ごもって身じろぎもせず、怯えた目で一点を見つめている。{/n}「あたくしの立場を異種族に説明するつもりはありません。あたくしの考えを知りたいと？我々はアトラスを守り、人類の利益のために使い続けなくてはなりません。こうした恐ろしい怪物ではなく、人類のために。さて、自由開拓者様、あなたはどちらにつくのですか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我……”{n}卡西娅迟疑地愣在哪里，但惊恐的目光却变得更加坚定。{/n}“我不打算再向这些异形解释什么了。你想知道我是怎么想的吗？我认为，圣仪必须保存下来，我们必须利用它造福人类，不能把它交到这些可怕的怪物手里。好了，你到底站在哪边，行商浪人？”
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "I shan't explain myself to a xenos. Do you wish to know what I think? The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity, and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, whose side are you on, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: “我……”{n}卡西娅迟疑地愣在哪里，但惊恐的目光却变得更加坚定。{/n}“我不打算再向这些异形解释什么了。你想知道我是怎么想的吗？我认为，圣仪必须保存下来，我们必须利用它造福人类，不能把它交到这些可怕的怪物手里。好了，你现在打算站在哪边，行商浪人？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Je... » {n}Cassia se fige un court instant, mais très vite son regard effrayé se fait plus dur.{/n} « Je n'ai pas à m'expliquer devant un xénos. Vous voulez savoir ce que je pense ? L'Atlas doit être sauvé, et nous devons continuer à l'utiliser pour le bien de l'humanité, et pas selon le bon plaisir de ces créatures répugnantes. Alors, dites-moi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, dans quel camp êtes-vous ? »
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "I shan't explain myself to a xenos. Do you wish to know what I think? The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity, and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, whose side are you on, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: « Je... » {n}Cassia se fige un court instant, mais très vite son regard effrayé se fait plus dur.{/n} « Je n'ai pas à m'expliquer devant un xénos. Vous voulez savoir ce que je pense ? L'Atlas doit être sauvé, et nous devons continuer à l'utiliser pour le bien de l'humanité, et pas selon le bon plaisir de ces créatures répugnantes. Alors, dites-moi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}, dans quel camp êtes-vous ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Yo...». {n}Cassia se detiene, dubitativa, pero su mirada asustada se endurece.{/n} «No pienso darle explicaciones a un xenos. ¿Quieres saber lo que pienso? Debemos salvar el Atlas y debemos seguir utilizándolo por el bien de la Humanidad, y no por el de criaturas abominables como vosotros. ¿A qué bando apoya, Comerciante Independiente?».
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "I shan't explain myself to a xenos. Do you wish to know what I think? The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity, and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, whose side are you on, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: «Yo...». {n}Cassia se detiene, dubitativa, pero su mirada asustada se endurece.{/n} «No pienso darle explicaciones a un xenos. ¿Quieres saber lo que pienso? Debemos salvar el Atlas y debemos seguir utilizándolo por el bien de la Humanidad, y no por el de criaturas abominables como vosotros. ¿A qué bando va a apoyar, Comerciante Independiente?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Ich ..." {n}Cassia erstarrt zögerlich, doch dann verhärtet sich ihr verängstigter Blick.{/n} "Ich werde mich einem Xenos gegenüber nicht rechtfertigen. Wollt Ihr wissen, was ich denke? Der Atlas muss gerettet werden, und wir müssen ihn weiter zum Wohle der Menschheit einsetzen, und nicht zum Wohle von grauenhaften Kreaturen wie dieser. Nun, auf wessen Seite steht Ihr, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}?"
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "I shan't explain myself to a xenos. Do you wish to know what I think? The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity, and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, whose side are you on, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich ..." {n}Cassia erstarrt zögerlich, doch dann verhärtet sich ihr verängstigter Blick.{/n} "Ich werde mich einem Xenos gegenüber nicht rechtfertigen. Wollt Ihr wissen, was ich denke? Der Atlas muss gerettet werden, und wir müssen ihn weiter zum Wohle der Menschheit einsetzen, und nicht zum Wohle von grauenhaften Kreaturen wie dieser. Also dann, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, auf wessen Seite schlagt Ihr Euch?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Yani..." {n}Cassia, tereddüt edip donakalıyor. En sonunda korku dolu bakışları iyice sertleşiyor.{/n} "Zenolara açıklama yapacak değilim. Ne düşündüğümü söylememi ister misin? Atlas'ı kurtarmalıyız. Ayrıca bunlar gibi berbat yaratıkların değil, İnsanlığın çıkarları uğruna kullanmaya devam etmeliyiz. Şimdi söyle bakalım, kimin tarafındasın Hür Tacir?"
languages.original_text: "I..." {n}Cassia freezes hesitantly, only for her frightened gaze to harden.{/n} "I shan't explain myself to a xenos. Do you wish to know what I think? The Atlas must be saved, and we must continue using it for the good of Humanity, and not that of ghastly creatures such as these. Now then, whose side are you on, Rogue Trader?"

traits.locale_text: "Yani..." {n}Cassia tereddüt edip donakalıyor, ardından da korku dolu bakışları sertleşiyor.{/n} "Kendimi bir zenoya açıklayacak değilim. Ne düşündüğümü söylememi ister misin? Atlas'ı kurtarmalıyız. Ayrıca bunlar gibi berbat yaratıkların değil, İnsanlığın çıkarları uğruna kullanmaya devam etmeliyiz. O hâlde söyle bakalım, sen kimin tarafındasın Hür Tacir?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
